title: Amritsar: 2 bike-borne persons rob finance firm staffer of Rs 73K - The Tribune India
content: Amritsar: 2 bike-borne persons rob finance firm staffer of Rs 73K  The Tribune India
description: Two bike-borne persons snatched a bag containing over Rs 73,000 from a finance firm employee near Rajdhan village falling under the Mehta police station here on Thursday evening.
